version_description:
Now, You can upload a file to Sendy Cloud right after taking picture.
And also You can preview GIF files stored in Cloud or share-link on Sendy app.

Version 20.4.28
=New feature=
• Add a file upload option that upload files to Cloud directly after taking picture
• Add GIF viewer
• Add predictive text feature when enter email address
= Performance improve=
• Improved UI and performance

If you have any questions please go to Settings > Help Cener to contact us. Thanks!

Fixed minor bugs.
